backend/main.mo: Defines core hotel, room, booking, payment, and invite types, initializes system-level maps, and exposes admin and invite-related canister methods with mixins for storage and authorization.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping feature IDs to related frontend files, components, and test IDs for traceability.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short descriptions of various frontend files covering routing, components, hooks, styles, and pages.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables and light/dark theme tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point defining metadata, favicon, root element, and script loader for the React app.
frontend/REGRESSION_CHECKLIST.md: Pre‑release checklist detailing authentication, hotel/room management, booking flow, and regression steps with emphasis on room creation and visibility.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring QueryClient, router routes, auth/role guards, locale provider, and app shell layout.
frontend/src/buildInfo.ts: Exports the build version constant for deployment identification.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminBooki: Admin panel component fetching all bookings and rendering them in a table with statuses, totals, and detail dialogs.
frontend/src/components/admin/HotelVisib: Admin panel listing hotels with controls to toggle active status and subscription state, showing badges and guidance.
frontend/src/components/admin/InviteToke: UI for generating, validating, and listing hotel invite tokens bound to principals, with copy and error handling features.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Access denial screen showing required roles, navigation options, and hotel activation workflow when needed.
frontend/src/components/auth/GuardErrorS: Error screen for permission guard failures with retry and navigation actions.
frontend/src/components/auth/HotelActiva: Form to validate and consume invite tokens to activate a hotel account, showing validation results and status.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileComp: Gate that prompts authenticated users without a profile to complete required fields before continuing.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Component enforcing Internet Identity authentication, showing login prompt when unauthenticated.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireRole: Role guard component that checks user role, admin status, and hotel activation before rendering children or showing access/error screens.
frontend/src/components/booking/BookingD: Dialog showing detailed booking information with optional guest principal copying and status display.
frontend/src/components/booking/BookingF: Form for creating a booking, calculating nights and price, and submitting booking data via mutation.
frontend/src/components/booking/BookingS: Maps booking status values to human-readable labels and badge variants for display.
frontend/src/components/debug/AuthDiagno: Debug panel showing authentication state, user role, admin status, and hotel activation info.
frontend/src/components/hotel/HotelBooki: Displays a table of hotel bookings with details, status badges, and access to the booking details dialog.
frontend/src/components/hotel/HotelPayme: Interface for viewing, adding, and removing a hotel's payment methods with validation and mutation calls.
frontend/src/components/hotel/HotelProfi: Form panel allowing hotel owners to view and update their profile details with validation and API mutation.
frontend/src/components/hotel/RecordStay: Displays eligible bookings and lets hotel staff mark stays as completed via a mutation call.
frontend/src/components/hotel/RoomsPanel: Manages creation and editing of hotel rooms, including image uploads, pricing, and room details.
frontend/src/components/hotel/Subscripti: Shows hotel subscription and activation status with conditional admin contact instructions.
Provides the main app layout with top navigation, content area, and footer.
frontend/src/components/nav/LanguageSele: Simple language selector component currently supporting only English.
frontend/src/components/nav/TopNav.tsx: Top navigation bar handling authentication, role-based links, and navigation visibility.
frontend/src/components/payments/Contact: Displays admin contact info and payment methods for hotel activation or subscription issues.
frontend/src/components/payments/HotelPa: Displays a hotel's payment methods or fallback contact options, with support for WhatsApp and email links.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication state, login, logout, and identity persistence through a React context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for calling backend APIs, including user roles, profiles, hotels, and invite token operations.
frontend/src/hooks/useRoomImageUpload.ts: Handles client-side room image uploads by converting files to data URLs with progress tracking.
frontend/src/i18n/LocaleContext.tsx: Simple locale context storing the selected language in localStorage and exposing setter functions.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light and dark theme variables and base styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point initializing React, query client, identity provider, and rendering the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/AccountStatusPage.tsx: Handles user identity, role, hotel activation state, and invite token validation/consumption, providing actions like refresh, copy, and admin elevation.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanelPage.tsx: Displays the admin dashboard with panels for invite tokens, hotel visibility, and booking management.
frontend/src/pages/BrowseHotelsPage.tsx: Fetches and displays a list of available hotels with basic info and navigation to detail pages.
frontend/src/pages/GuestAccountPage.tsx: Shows guest account overview and booking list with navigation to browse hotels and view account status.
frontend/src/pages/HotelAreaPage.tsx: Provides hotel owners with tabbed management views for profile, rooms, payments, bookings, stays, and subscription.
frontend/src/pages/HotelDetailPage.tsx: Loads and displays a single hotel’s details and rooms, with booking flow, error handling, and user profile checks.
frontend/src/pages/MainMenuPage.tsx: Presents the main entry menu with guest and hotel portals, dynamically adjusting access based on role and activation.
frontend/src/utils/debugFlags.ts: Enables debug mode based on dev environment or a URL parameter.
frontend/src/utils/money.ts: Provides currency symbols, names, support checks, and money formatting with thousand separators.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based param cleanup.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, color tokens, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, requirements, issues, and feature requests for fixing room upload persistence and visibility.
